flavorText: Few dare to brave the Dakra Isles. Those who return are forever changed.

foreignData.flavorText: Nur wenige wagen sich auf die Dakra-Inseln. Diejenigen, die zurückkehren, sind danach nie mehr wie vorher.
foreignData.name: Schüler der Sphinx
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Inspiriert — Immer wenn der Schüler der Sphinx enttappt wird, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Pocos se atreven a aventurarse en las islas de Dakra. Aquellos que regresan nunca vuelven a ser los mismos.
foreignData.name: Discípulo de la esfinge
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Inspiración — Siempre que el Discípulo de la esfinge se enderece, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Peu sont ceux qui osent braver les îles Dakra. Ceux qui en reviennent sont changés à jamais.
foreignData.name: Disciple du sphinx
foreignData.text:
Vol
Inspiration — À chaque fois que le Disciple du sphinx devient dégagé, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Pochi osano avventurarsi fino alle Isole Dakra. Coloro che ne fanno ritorno sono trasformati per sempre.
foreignData.name: Discepolo della Sfinge
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ispirazione — Ogniqualvolta il Discepolo della Sfinge viene STAPpato, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: ダクラ諸島へ向かおうとする者は少ない。そこより帰還した者たちはみな、永久に変わり果ててしまう。
foreignData.name: スフィンクスの信奉者
foreignData.text:
飛行
神啓 ― スフィンクスの信奉者がアンタップ状態になるたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 다크라 섬에 들어갈 용기가 있는 자는 많지 않다. 돌아온 자들은 영원히 그 모습이 바뀌기 때문이다.
foreignData.name: 스핑크스의 사도
foreignData.text:
비행
영감 — 스핑크스의 사도가 언탭될 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Poucos se atrevem a enfrentar as Ilhas Dakra. Aqueles que voltam, nunca mais são os mesmos.
foreignData.name: Discípulo da Esfinge
foreignData.text:
Voar
Inspirado — Toda vez que Discípulo da Esfinge se tornar desvirado, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Немногие смеют отправиться на зловещие острова Дакры. Те же, кто вернулся, меняются навсегда.
foreignData.name: Ученик Сфинкса
foreignData.text:
Полет
Одухотворение — Каждый раз, когда Ученик Сфинкса становится развернутым, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 鲜少有人敢去达克拉群岛，回来的人都永远改变了。
foreignData.name: 史芬斯的信徒
foreignData.text:
飞行
启悟～每当史芬斯的信徒成为未横置时，抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 鮮少有人敢去達克拉群島，回來的人都永遠改變了。
foreignData.name: 史芬斯的信徒
foreignData.text:
飛行
啟悟～每當史芬斯的信徒成為未橫置時，抽一張牌。

name: Sphinx's Disciple
originalText:
Flying
Inspired — Whenever Sphinx's Disciple becomes untapped, draw a card.

rulings.text: Inspired abilities trigger no matter how the creature becomes untapped: by the turn-based action at the beginning of the untap step or by a spell or ability.

If an inspired ability triggers during your untap step, the ability will be put on the stack at the beginning of your upkeep. If the ability creates one or more token creatures, those creatures won’t be able to attack that turn (unless they gain haste).
Inspired abilities don’t trigger when the creature enters the battlefield.
If the inspired ability includes an optional cost, you decide whether to pay that cost as the ability resolves. You can do this even if the creature leaves the battlefield in response to the ability.

text:
Flying
Inspired — Whenever Sphinx's Disciple becomes untapped, draw a card.
